## KoattyMetadata.add() method

Adds the given value for the given key by appending to a list of previous values associated with that key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
add(key: string, value: any): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string |  |
|  value | any |  |

**Returns:**

void
